Components

Components¶

Caution

This class is still under development and may change in the future.

Defines all superstructure components.

class rolland.components.DiscrPad(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: HasTraits

Discr pad class.

Parameters:

  • args (t.Any)

  • kwargs (t.Any)

sp¶

Pad stiffness vertical/lateral (total value) [N/m].

Type:

list of float

wdthp¶

Pad width [m].

Type:

float

etap¶

Pad loss factor [-].

Type:

float

fresp¶

Pad resonance frequency [Hz].

Type:

list of float

dp¶

Pad damping coefficient (viscous) for discrete pad [Ns/m].

Type:

list of float

class rolland.components.Rail(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: HasTraits

Rail class.

Defines a rail with certain properties. UIC 60 rail is usually used as default rail.

Hint

A set of predefined rail instances is available in the database module.

Parameters:

  • args (t.Any)

  • kwargs (t.Any)

rl_geo¶

Rail outline coordinates \([m]\).

Type:

list of tuple of float

E¶

Young’s modulus of rail \([Pa]\).

Type:

float

G¶

Shear modulus of rail \([Pa]\).

Type:

float

nu¶

Poisson’s ratio of rail \([-]\).

Type:

float

kap¶

Timoshenko shear correction factor \([-]\).

Type:

float

mr¶

Rail mass per unit length \([kg/m]\).

Type:

float

rho¶

Density of rail \([kg/m^3]\).

Type:

float

etar¶

Rail loss factor \([-]\).

Type:

float

fresr¶

Rail resonance frequency \([Hz]\).

Type:

float

dr¶

Rail damping coefficient (viscous) \([Ns/m]\).

Type:

float

gamr¶

Coordinates of rail shear center \([m]\).

Type:

list of float

epsr¶

Coordinates of center of gravity \([m]\).

Type:

list of float

Iyr¶

Area moment of inertia of rail around y-axis \([m^4]\).

Type:

float

Izr¶

Area moment of inertia of rail around z-axis \([m^4]\).

Type:

float

Itr¶

Torsional constant of rail \([m^4]\).

Type:

float

Ar¶

Cross-sectional area of rail \([m^2]\).

Type:

float

Asr¶

Surface area per unit length of rail \([m^2/m]\).

Type:

float

Vr¶

Volume per unit length of rail \([m^3/m]\).

Type:

float

class rolland.components.RailRoughness(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: HasTraits

Rail roughness class.

Contains a rail roughness spectrum in frequency domain, which can later be used to calculate the track roughness along the track.

Parameters:

  • args (t.Any)

  • kwargs (t.Any)

r_rough¶

Rail roughness spectrum \([f, m]\).

Type:

Tuple containing two lists of float
